title: Winter Cigars
itunes:title: Winter Cigars
description: This week we're lighting up cigars that are perfect for the winter... Comedians in Cars Smoking Cigars... Upcoming "Cigar" March Madness, and news from Capital Hill on Dave's trip to Washington DC... We light up Perla Del Mar P, Gran Reserve Corojo No1, and Recluse Petite Corona (all great sticks under $5 bucks)
